column4: Hey guys is there a linux command to clear the MBR? GRUB has somehow messed it up and now windows is unable to rewrite the MBR
or at least a way to get GRUB off the MBR
i dont think that can happen. windows should be able to write to the mbr.
you could use 'dd' to blank out the mbr.. but if used wrongly = blank out the hard drive
